metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12616 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: When using a VirtualDirContext with Apache Tomcat 7.0.0 to 7.0.80 it was possible to bypass security constraints and/or view the source code of JSPs for resources served by the VirtualDirContext using a specially crafted request.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> this commit is included in commit list for CVE-2017-12617

criterions.comment: tomcat7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
